_source.text: 1) Homocysteine,Methyl MalonicAcid (B12 in the cell itself) 2.) 125 hydrox-Vitamin D(See D flowchart-This test is better than 25 hydrox D) 3.) Total T3 + Total T4 (2 of 3 main hormones produced by Thyroid) 4.) Cortisol (Adrenal Cortex hormone needed for blood pressure & metabolism) 5.) Androgens/ Estrogen (Estriol is good type of estrogen see B12 flowchart) 6.) Aldersterone (Adrenal Cortex hormone regulates Sodium & Potassium .
